Method Summary
 void displayDxDy()
          Displays the algorithm's guess for dx and dy, and the actual values of dx and dy
 int getAccumulatedDetection(int row, int col)
          Returns the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object.
 int getNumCols()
          Returns the number of columns in the radar grid
 int getNumRows()
          Returns the number of rows in the radar grid
 int getNumScans()
          Returns the number of scans that have been performed since the radar object was constructed
 boolean isDetected(int row, int col)
          Returns true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection.
 void scan()
          Records the state of the radar in the 2D Array prevScan, Performs a scan of the radar and updates currentScan, Noise is injected into the grid and the accumulator is updated.
 void scanForMonster()
          Compares each highlighted pixel of prevScan with highlighted pixels of currentScan in a 5 pixel radius and increments the corresponding [dx][dy] in vectorDistribution
 void setNewMonsterLocation()
          Sets the location of the monster
 void setNoiseFraction(double fraction)
          Sets the probability that a given cell will generate a false detection
 int wrap(int coord)
          Alters coordinates outside of the bounds of the radar grid to wrap continuously

displayDxDy

public void displayDxDy()
Displays the algorithm's guess for dx and dy, and the actual values of dx and dy

getAccumulatedDetection

public int getAccumulatedDetection(int row,
                                   int col)
Returns the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object.

Parameters:
row - the row of the location to query for accumulated detections
col - the column of the location to query for accumulated detections
Returns:
the number of times that the specified location in the radar grid has triggered a detection since the constructor of the radar object

isDetected

public boolean isDetected(int row,
                          int col)
Returns true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection.

Parameters:
row - the row of the location to query for detection
col - the column of the location to query for detection
Returns:
true if the specified location in the radar grid triggered a detection

scan

public void scan()
Records the state of the radar in the 2D Array prevScan, Performs a scan of the radar and updates currentScan, Noise is injected into the grid and the accumulator is updated.

scanForMonster

public void scanForMonster()
Compares each highlighted pixel of prevScan with highlighted pixels of currentScan in a 5 pixel radius and increments the corresponding [dx][dy] in vectorDistribution

setNewMonsterLocation

public void setNewMonsterLocation()
Sets the location of the monster

setNoiseFraction

public void setNoiseFraction(double fraction)
Sets the probability that a given cell will generate a false detection

Parameters:
fraction - the probability that a given cell will generate a flase detection expressed as a fraction (must be >= 0 and < 1)

wrap

public int wrap(int coord)
Alters coordinates outside of the bounds of the radar grid to wrap continuously

Parameters:
coord - the coordinate to be modified
